title: Logging messages to file in Python not working when running outside interactive mode in VS Code
content:
I have a simple Python code that logs messages to a file using the logging module.

However, when I run this code in Visual Studio Code (VS Code) outside of the interactive mode, I do not see any logs in the file.

Strangely, when I run the same code in the interactive mode, the logs are successfully written to the file. Here is my code
